sentences.en: A team of divers was sent down to examine the wreck.
sentences.cn: 一组潜水员被送到水下检查沉船。

sentences.en: Examine the account well before you pay it.
sentences.cn: 在付款以前仔细核对一下帐目.

sentences.en: Examine the painful area carefully in an effort to localize the most tender point.
sentences.cn: 仔细检查痛处，找出最痛的地方来。

sentences.en: He trained his camera on nature, sometimes zooming in to examine single leaves.
sentences.cn: 他把自己的照相机对准了大自然，时而拉近镜头仔细观察一片片的叶子。

sentences.en: He went to the Congo to examine a new volcano.
sentences.cn: 他曾去刚果察看一座新火山.

sentences.en: Hegel’s philosophy will be examined in detail in Chapter 4.
sentences.cn: 黑格尔的哲学将在第4章作详细探讨。

sentences.en: I need to examine all possible contingencies.
sentences.cn: 我需要审视一切可能出现的情况。

sentences.en: I was stimulated to examine my deepest thoughts.
sentences.cn: 我深受启发，开始审视自己内心深处的想法。

sentences.en: It is most risky to go and examine an active volcano.
sentences.cn: 去探察活火山是非常危险的.

sentences.en: Please examine the insulation of the electric wires in my house.
sentences.cn: 请检查一下我屋子里电线的绝缘情况.

sentences.en: She was sent to examine into the matter.
sentences.cn: 她奉派去调查那件事情.

sentences.en: The committee will examine the agreement and any problems arising therefrom.
sentences.cn: 委员会将审查这项协议和由此引起的问题。

sentences.en: The doctor examine the patient carefully.
sentences.cn: 医生对这位病人作了仔细检查.

sentences.en: The teacher will examine the students in English.
sentences.cn: 老师要考学生的英语了.

sentences.en: The teacher will examine the students in music.
sentences.cn: 老师将测验学生们的音乐知识.

sentences.en: We examine the wording in detail before deciding on the final text.
sentences.cn: 我们彻底仔细地检查了措词后才最终定稿。

sentences.en: You examine a patient and then you decide whether or not to operate.
sentences.cn: 先为病人作检查，然后再决定是否做手术。

words.tran_cn: 应试者；受审查者；受检查者
检验员；主考人；[专利] 审查员
检查;细查;考察;考虑;分析

trans.tran_cn: 仔细检查，检查身体，审查，考核，法庭询问
trans.tran_en: to look at something carefully and thoroughly because you want to find out more about it

trans.tran_cn: 检查， 仔细观察； 讯问， 审查
trans.tran_en: to look at something carefully and thoroughly because you want to find out more about it
